code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ExpenseForm(_ref){let{onAdd}=_ref;const[amount,setAmount]=useState("");const[category,setCategory]=useState("");const[date,setDate]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd({amount,category,date});setAmount("");setCategory("");setDate("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4 space-y-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Amount",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Category",value:category,onChange:e=>setCategory(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:date,onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 w-full",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Add Expense"})]});}export default ExpenseForm;
